intent_atoms.description: Implement VR-006 research logging so unknown boxes and catalog gaps are tracked alongside VR-003 warnings.
VR-006 research logging must track unknown boxes and catalog gaps in addition to VR-003 warnings.
Continue implementing remaining validation rules (VR-001, VR-002, VR-004, VR-005) in alignment with @todo #3.
Validation rules VR-001, VR-002, VR-004, VR-5 must be implemented according to the specifications outlined in @todo #3.
